com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action1.Name: Voice Changer Options
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action1.Tooltip: Change the voice changer sound type

com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action3.Name: Voice changer on/off
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action3.Tooltip: Click to turn the voice changer on or off

com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action4.Name: Hear your own voice on/off
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action4.Tooltip: Click to turn on or off to hear your own voice

com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action5.Name: Background effect on/off
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action5.Tooltip: Click to turn on or off background effects

com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action6.Name: Silent on/off
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action6.Tooltip: Click to turn mute on or off

com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action7.Name: Instant beep
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action7.Tooltip: Reproduce microphone checker beeps on key press

com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action8.Name: Push to voice converter
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action8.Tooltip: Press and hold the button to turn on the voice changer, release to turn it off

com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action9.Name: Soundboard play
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action9.Tooltip: This operation plays the audio file of the soundboard

com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action10.Name: Stop all memes from playing
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action10.Tooltip: This action will pause all playing memes

com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action11.Name: Mute for me on/off
com.hotspot.streamdock.voicemod.action11.Tooltip: This action will toggle the mute button state for me
